name: Starfell (DalasKingora)
description:
Starfell is an solo developed  prototype of a possible combat system for my future game. It was a school project with a time limit of only 2 weeks to see our limits alone in a short amount of time.

Starfell doesn't have much lore more than to protect the stars from pesky aliens.

You can kinda say that Starfell is a fake Rhythm game.

Art, programing as well as music was made by me. 

Bugs and glitches may accure.

I love feedback in any kind!
